name: CargoAuthNew
description: Uses external/system access tokens to authenticate to cargo
author: Henry Wang <wanghenry@microsoft.com>

inputs.name: configFile
inputs.label: cargo config file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a override path to cargo config; otherwise, the default in the current build source directory will be used

inputs.name: externalAuthToken
inputs.label: Authentication token for external registries
inputs.helpMarkDown: This may be omitted if you know that there are no external registries that need to be authenticated. Otherwise, when omitted, any registries that aren't in our own organization will not be authenticated.

inputs.name: externalOrganizations
inputs.label: External organization list
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-delimited list of external organizations that should be authenticated using our externalAuthToken. Any organizations not listed here will not be authenticated

inputs.name: internalOrganization
inputs.label: Internal organization
inputs.helpMarkDown: The organization that should be denoted as the 'internal' organization, i.e. should use the system access token by default.

inputs.name: ignoreOrganizations
inputs.label: Ignore organization list
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-delimited list of organizations that should not be authenticated to at all. This also suppresses warnings for these organization if we weren't normally able to authenticate to it due to the external* inputs
